actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Commerce to use sampling methods in taking agricultural censuses.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Commerce to use sampling methods in taking agricultural censuses, except that he may substitute another method where he determines that sampling methods would be inappropriate. (Amends 13 U.S.C. 142(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Commerce to use sampling methods in taking agricultural censuses.
